STEP 2 - EVIDENCE-BASED TREATMENT SELECTION: Now I'll select treatments based on current clinical guidelines. - First-line treatment per guidelines: For glaucoma, initiate intraocular pressure (IOP) lowering therapy; for ischemic optic neuropathy, focus on vascular risk management. - Supporting evidence: Lowering IOP can slow glaucoma progression; managing vascular risk factors reduces ischemic events. - Patient-specific considerations: Age, degree of visual loss, and anxiety; psychological support needed. - Contraindications or cautions: Avoid sudden IOP drops that significantly lower ocular perfusion; monitor for medication side effects.
